titles.title: I Will Lift Up My Eyes

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will lift up my eyes to the mountains From where shall my help come From the Maker of earth and of heaven O Lord, You’re the keeper of my soul{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Through the day and the night You protect me from all evil When I go when I come You’re my hiding place You will guard, You will keep me today And forevermore{/lang-eng}
